name: Hip Rotation
steps: Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Extend your arms out to the sides with palms facing down for stability.
Keeping your knees together, lower them to one side until you feel a stretch or your hip touches the ground.
Hold for 1-2 seconds, then lift your legs back up to the starting position.
Lower your legs to the other side and repeat the movement.
Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

ailing.lower back pain: use caution and modify as needed
